name: TrivyResultUploader
description: Uploads Trivy scan results to a specified API endpoint
helpMarkDown: This task uploads Trivy vulnerability scans results via HTTP POST.
author: Thiago Loureiro

inputs.name: apiUrl
inputs.label: API URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the API URL to upload the Trivy results, this API call will be a POST request with a the file as a payload, and the application name go as a parameter url/{appname}.

inputs.name: application
inputs.label: Application Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the application name that results will be sent to the API.

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the API Key for authentication. This will be sent as a header in the request.
